author: Muhammed bin Vaiz bin Velican Marʻaşî.
contents: 7. fol. 22b-25b: Sharāb al-kawthar fī ʻilm al-maʻānī.
15. fol. 52b-54a: Ṭarīq al-ṣawāb fī ʻilm al-ādāb.
16. fol. 55b-60a: Risālah fī ʻilm al-maʻānī wa-al-bayān.
18. fol. 61b-62a: Salāmat al-qulūb fī bayān ithbāt al-maṭlūb.
19. fol. 62b-65a: Sharḥ Salāmat al-qulūb fī bayān ithbāt al-maṭlūb.
20. fol. 66b-68b: Insān al-ʻayn wa-ʻayn al-insān fī bayān uṣūl al-fiqh.
21. fol. 69b-73b: ʻIṣmat al-adhhān fī ʻilm al-mīzān.
22. fol. 74b: Risālah-i Zubdat al-dhahab. First page only.
extent: 74 leaves : paper ; 208 x 129 mm. bound to 208 x 135 mm.
creator: Muhammed bin Vaiz bin Velican Marʻaşî.
dlme_creator_ara_latn: Muhammed bin Vaiz bin Velican Marʻaşî.
subject: Qurʼan. Sūrat al-Kawthar—Commentaries—Early works to 1800
